author: NICK PERRY and JOCELYN NOVECK Associated Press
title: US nears China's virus death toll as New York calls for help
description: The mounting death toll from the virus outbreak in the United States has it poised to overtake China's grim tally of 3,300 deaths, with New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo saying up to 1 million more healthcare workers are needed in the city
content:
NEW YORK -- 
The mounting death toll from the virus outbreak in the United States had it poised Tuesday to overtake China's grim toll of 3,300 deaths, with New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo saying up to 1 million more healthcare workers were needed. Please come hel… [+5599 chars]
